description: Discover unbeatable deals and discounts on Puma athletic wear, footwear, and accessories. Explore our Puma deals and coupons to unlock incredible discounts on your favorite Puma gear.

posts.post_content:
The NU-TILITY Full-Zip Women's Hoodie features a flattering fit and soft all-over feel making it a modern staple. Branded webbing loops and a modern fit take this everyday zip up from basic to bold.

  • Relaxed fit
  • Full-length zip
  • Comfy hood with stand-up collar
  • Ribbed detail at waistband and cuffs for snug fit
  • Cotton
  • Moisture-wicking dryCELL technology
  • Soft brushed fabric made for movement and comfort
  • PUMA branding

These fleece training pants are ideal for those cooler training sessions. The ergonomic cut and elasticated waistband ensure comfortable and unrestricted movement, and the side pockets give you somewhere to store your essentials. PUMA's dryCELL technology helps wick moisture away from your skin, keeping you cool and dry during your workout.

  • dryCELL: PUMA's designation for moisture-wicking properties that help keep you dry and comfortable
  • Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibres. One of PUMA's answers to reduce its environmental impact.
  • Full length with cuffed bottom
  • Elasticated waistband
  • Side slant pockets
  • Ergonomic cut for greater range of movement
  • PUMA Cat Logo on left thigh
  • Recycled polyester and cotton

The Tsukisho V2 Men's Slippers are designed especially for your indoor strolls, the soft mesh strap and EVA sole makes it light and comfortable to wear all day long.

  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • PUMA wordmark on the footbed
  • Mesh strap
  • EVA infused midsole for lightweight
  • Textures outsole for grip
  • PUMA No.2 logo at strap

If you’re a man on the move, these smart 2-in-1 shorts with integral inner tights promote activity with ease. Moisture-wicking fabrication keeps you cool and dry as you train, and the side vents on the outer shorts enable increased movement.

  • dryCELL: Performance technology designed to wick moisture from the body and keep you free of sweat during exercise
  • Midori Made with the bio-based finishing treatment miDori® bioWick
  • Recycled Content: Made with at least 20% recycled material as a step toward a better future
  • Tight fit
  • Three-quarter length
  • Adjustable waistband with tunnelled drawcord
  • PUMA Cat Logo on the left thigh

Stand-out and dance to the style tunes with the PUMA Shoes.
    Syntethic Upper provides durabilty
  • Low boot Construction & lace closure gives an optimal fit
  • PUMA Branding gives great design elevation
  • Rubber Outsole for better traction

Bad weather? Bring it on. You're covered. Literally, in this case. This padded jacket features warmCELL, which will keep you warm no matter what Mother Nature throws at you. And when the rain's gone, you simply fold the hood into the collar and you've got a new, but equally stylish, silhouette.

  • warmCELL: PUMA’s designation for thermal insulation traps heat close to the body to help keep you warm in cool conditions
  • Regular fit
  • Side zip pockets for secure storage solutions
  • Chest zip pocket
  • Convertible hood which folds in to a high protective collar
  • Inside storm flap with grown on chin guard
  • Elastic cuffs and hem
  • Hanger loop
  • PUMA Cat Logo pigment print on front
  • PUMA Wordmark pigment print on back
  • Polyester and nylon

Simple, versatile and chic, just as any good top should be: this oversized sweatshirt is cut so that it falls generously over the body without looking baggy. A vertical seam down the centre of the sweatshirt adds to its uniqueness. Pair with skinny jeans and flats for a preppy, unpretentious look.

  • Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibers. One of PUMA's answers to reduce our environmental impact.
  • Throw on over anything thanks to a relaxed fit
  • Classic comfortable ribbed Crew
  • Ribbed cuffs and hem lend subtle structure to the garment
  • Visually striking centred vertical seam
  • PUMA batch at left chest
posts.post_title: Downtown Oversized Crew Loose Fit Women's Sweat Shirt

posts.post_content:
The perfect all-round pants, these sleek 7/8 Women’s Knitted Pants are the ultimate in comfort and style. Made from a soft cotton jersey, these pants are ideal for everyday wear whether at home or on the go. Its distinctly feminine silhouette and shorter length takes modern women’s streetwear to a new level, while its carefully constructed design is highly functional no matter where your day takes you.

  • Medium rise
  • Slim fit
  • 88% cotton, 12% polyester
  • 7/8 Length
  • Elasticated drawstring waist
posts.post_title: PUMA 7/8 Women's Slim Fit Track Pants

posts.post_content:
Welcome to a new era of performance footwear with the PUMA NITRO. This technologically advanced shoe features our innovative foam technology, engineered via a Super Critical Process, making it 50% lighter than standard EVA and 35% lighter than Pro-Foam Lite. The result is a shoe that delivers superior responsiveness, exceptional cushioning, and unparalleled lightness, enhancing your running performance. PUMA NITRO's ground-breaking design assures an effortless ride, transforming your running experience with every stride.
An all-in-one neutral running shoe for any distance, now engineered for a wider foot, the Velocity NITRO 2 Wide is a lightweight and sleek update to the Run PUMA roster. Featuring NITRO foam for exceptional responsiveness and ultimate cushioning, this upgrade to the original is a well-fitting and durable shoe for a smooth ride. PUMAGRIP offers multi-surface traction, from Treadmilll to track. 
  • NITRO: Advanced nitrogen-injected foam designed to provide superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package
  • PUMAGRIP: Durable performance rubber compound designed for all-surface traction
  • Heel type: Flat
  • Wide fit
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
  • Heel-to-toe-drop: 8 mm
  • Built for an average running distance of upto 800 km
  • Engineered mesh upper
  • Reflective design elements
  • Cushioning level: Medium
  • PUMA Formstrip on the lateral side
  • Ideal for Road & Treadmill Running
posts.post_title: Velocity Nitro 2 Wide Men's Running Shoes

posts.post_content: DryCELL : Highly functional materials draw sweat away from your skin and help keep you dry and comfortable during exercise;Graphic all over print;Cat logo reflective for enhanced visibility in low light conditions;Elastic waistband with internal drawcords;Mesh inserts for breathability;Tight fit;

This edition of the Mirage Sport brings together classic sport and edgy streetwear vibes to create a sultry look made up of dynamic lines, constructions, and overlays, plus an ultra-cool nylon upper. These sneakers draw inspiration from DJ culture for a fashion-forward feel that follows the beat of contemporary style.

  • Nylon upper
  • IMEVA midsole
  • Rubber outsole
  • Synthetic overlay on heel and eyestay
  • Transparent TPU heatcut overlay on toe
  • Embossed and screen-printed top eyelet
  • Lycra tongue
  • PUMA Formstrip on medial and lateral sides
  • Reflective design elements
posts.post_title: Mirage Sport Tech Reflective Unisex Sneakers

posts.post_content:
Made for the Motorsport champions of the future, the Kart Cat Mid III high-top trainer is designed to enhance and accelerate the performance of any kart fanatic. This third iteration is available in great racing team and manufacturer designs such as this one for Scuderia Ferrari, winners of 16 Formula 1 Constructors' Championships./p>

  • Synthetic upper with stitching details
  • Hook-and-loop strap for increased convenience
  • Rubber outsole with POWER and BRAKE wording for perfect grip
posts.post_title: Ferrari Kart Cat Mid Men's Sneakers

posts.post_content:
Inspired by vintage Science-Fiction movies, the RS-Simul8 Sci-Fi Sneakers blend retro and futuristic details in an imaginative design. This FUTRO sneaker is built with RS cushioning technology and features playful details such as TPU gels, speckles, and mini planets.

  • Hot-melt toe overlay and eyestay with debossed edges
  • PU midsole
  • Rubber outsole
  • TPU heat-cut PUMA Formstrip with screen printed graphic

Perfect for casual outings or laid-back weekends at home, step into comfort with the Tsukisho Men's Flip Flops. These stylish flip-flops sport a thong strap design adorned with the PUMA logo, exhibiting a relaxed yet sporty vibe. The EVA outsole promises supreme cushioning, offering a soft, comfortable underfoot feel. Furthermore, the outsole features grooves that enhance grip and stability, ensuring you walk with confidence.

  • PU strap for durability
  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • EVA outsole for lightweight
  • PUMA Wordmark at strap
  • PUMA Cat logo at footbed

Featuring pockets and a comfortable, padded fit, this backpack is form and function at its best, take charge of your day in the cool and classic structure of our PUMA Derby backpack.
  • Two compartments with two-way zip opening
  • Padded adjustable shoulder straps
  • Mesh slip-in pocket at side
  • Zip compartment on front
  • Webbing carry handle at top
  • Padded back panel
  • PUMA Archive No.1 Logo at front

Step up your game with the Train Fav Heather Men's Crew-Neck T-shirt. The heathered knit and Cat logo offers both style and function for your next sporting event or casual outing. The breathable fabric keeps you cool and comfortable, while the sleek design ensures you look your best both on and off the field.
  • Crew neck
  • Regular fit
  • PUMA Cat logo at chest
posts.post_title: Train Fav Heather Men's Crew-Neck T-shirt

posts.post_content:
PUMA's SOFTRIDE technology represents an advancement in footwear comfort. It incorporates our softest foam, designed to deliver extreme cushioning that promotes sustained comfort throughout the day. The SOFTRIDE midsole, softer and lighter than traditional EVA, extends through the full length of the shoe. This innovative construction enhances the wearer's experience, providing lightweight support during daily activities.
Bringing you high performance with a casual feel, the SOFTRIDE Vital Repel Men's Walking Shoes combines PUMA's ultra-cushioning SOFTRIDE technology and SoftFoam+ outsole with a high-traction zoned rubber outsole – all packaged into a sleek, understated silhouette with dual PUMA Formstrip branding.
  • SoftFoam+: PUMA's comfort sockliner for instant step-in and long-lasting comfort that provides soft cushioning every step of your day
  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
  • Heel-to-toe-drop: 12 mm
  • Low boot
  • SOFTRIDE midsole for extreme cushioning and all-day comfort
  • Zoned rubber outsole for traction during training
  • PUMA Formstrip on both quarter panels
  • PUMA Wordmark down the heel
posts.post_title: SOFTRIDE Vital Repel Men's Walking Shoes

posts.post_content:
Energize your athletic spirit with PUMA x one8 Virat Kohli collection. Echoing Virat's favourites, the dynamic sportswear and athleisure line supports both vigorous workouts and relaxed outings. Designed for the active individual, this iconic collection celebrates the transformative power of sport. Embrace a faster, better, forever lifestyle and live your game!
Feel the power surge through your body as you step into the Better Foam Emerge One8 Unisex Running Shoes. Especially created for running purposes, you can cover miles and miles without any worry. In fact, you will only be more motivated because the mesh upper ensure that your feet are dry and the Better Foam, which won't just keep you light on your feet but will make you feel good that you're doing something for the environment: it's created with 35% bio-based sugarcane EVA. As far as the look goes, it's 10/10.
  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
  • Mesh upper for breathability
  • Lace closure for snug and customized fit
  • Midsole made from Better Foam lightweight eco foam materials for a reduced carbon footprint and comfortable ride
  • one8 insignia on pull tab at tongue
  • PUMA Cat logo and PUMA Wordmark at lateral side
  • one8 insignia at heel
posts.post_title: Better Foam Emerge one8 Unisex Running Shoes

posts.post_content:
A new part of our Contemporary Essentials Collection, the Lex Men's Running Shoes combine training functionality with a unique lifestyle aesthetic. As well as featuring plenty of overlays, a moulded plush collar and a tooling with detailed scribe and paint lines, these trainers offer something truly eye-catching: a diamond TPU piece embedded in the tooling. These fresh and fast shoes are a sight to see - and a delight to wear.

  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
  • Heel-to-toe-drop: 8 mm
  • Low boot
  • Bold colour-blocking in the upper
  • Premium tech mesh overlays
  • Moulded plush collar
  • Tooling with detailed scribe and paint lines
  • Diamond TPU piece
  • Lace closure for a snug fit
  • PUMA Formstrip at lateral sides
  • PUMA Wordmark on tongue
  • Ideal for firm ground surface

PUMA's RS series revives the 1980s high-quality cushioning with RS (Running System) foam, an improved EVA compound offering superior rebound and enhanced stability. Originally developed by the RS Computer, this technology offers excellent energy return and a secure, confident stride, blending vintage aesthetics with advanced performance.

Joining the RS family with a sharp and streetwise silhouette, the RS-Z Moulded Trainers boast an extreme design language and super-striking colours. You will be bossing it, with a mix of debossed and embossed sections and a mesh and synthetic upper and lycra overlays. And with low-key branding, this piece is a fashion gamechanger.

  • Running System: PUMA's comfortable cushioning technology celebrates the reinvention of a unique moment and movement in culture
  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • Heel-to-toe-drop: 0 mm
  • Low boot
  • Mesh and synthetic upper
  • Leather toe overlay
  • Synthetic leather heel overlay with debossed edges
  • Lycra eyestay with debossed edges
  • Lycra PUMA Formstrip with debossed lines at sides
  • PUMA Cat Logo at heel

True style is evergreen, which is why we updated our iconic X-Ray trainer for winter. This design was first issued in the early 2000s and features on-trend chunky details while innovating with a mix of materials and sleek tooling that make it a memorable next step in fashion evolution.

  • IMEVA: PUMA’s midsole for a lightweight and comfortable feel
  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • Heel-to-toe-drop: 0 mm
  • Mid boot profile
  • Textile and synthetic upper
  • Rugged rubber outsole
  • Lace closure
  • PUMA Wordmark on tag at tongue
  • PUMA No.2 Logo at lateral side
  • PUMA Formstrip at lateral side
posts.post_title: X-Ray 2 Square Mid WTR Men's Sneakers

posts.post_content:
Put on essential PUMA style with these cool Essential 3/4 Women's Tights, made from sustainably-sourced cotton, with bold PUMA Logo branding at the leg.

  • Tight fit
  • 3/4 length
  • 89% polyester Recycled, 11% elastane - single jersey

  • Elastic waistband

Stay a step ahead of the style pack in this contemporary reimagining of a classic PUMA silhouette. Our Leadcat leads the pack with the streamlined silhouette and luxurious comfort known and expected of this iconic shoe. Our Neymar Jr Leadcat 2.0 CLBR G Sandals take inspiration from the Brazilian football legend to deliver a fashionable silhouette with sporty flair matched with the comfort of our IMEVA midsole.

  • IMEVA: PUMA's material for a lightweight and comfortable feel
  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
  • Heel-to-toe-drop: 0 mm
  • Sandal construction
  • Textile strap with webbed accents
  • Moulded footbed
  • Graphics on footbed and strap

posts.post_content:
One of the most memorable PUMA styles is easily the Easy Rider. The Easy Rider II 75Y features the original cushioning lug sole seen in the '70s and comes with bold gold foil accents and suede overlays that enhance the vintage vibes of these shoes.

  • Nylon upper
  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
  • Heel-to-toe-drop: 0 mm

posts.post_content:
Get low on and off the court in these retro sneakers inspired by classic pop culture and basketball style. The casual throwback style captures the essence of old-school cool, featuring the classic PUMA Formstrip in a contrast design and subtle big-cat branding. Step it back to the classics in these stunning sneakers.

  • SoftFoam+: Step-in comfort sockliner designed to provide soft cushioning thanks to its extra thick heel
  • Recycled Content: The upper of this shoe is made with at least 20% recycled materials as a step toward a better future
  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • Heel-to-toe-drop: 0 mm

  • Rubber midsole and outsole

  • PUMA Formstrip on lateral and medial sides

These lightweight Flip Flops give all round comfort, cushioning, durability & support in a simplistic design. The EVA outsole provides premium cushioning.
  • Synthetic upper
  • EVA outsole

PUMA's SOFTRIDE technology represents an advancement in footwear comfort. It incorporates our softest foam, designed to deliver extreme cushioning that promotes sustained comfort throughout the day. The SOFTRIDE midsole, softer and lighter than traditional EVA, extends through the full length of the shoe. This innovative construction enhances the wearer's experience, providing lightweight support during daily activities.

Combining the best of comfort and casual style, the SOFTRIDE Slide is the perfect addition to your fashion arsenal. Whether you’re strutting the summer streets or cooling off after a workout, they’re a must-have for every trendsetter. The SOFTRIDE footbed guarantees your feet are well looked after, while the synthetic strap is enhanced with soft padding for the ultimate cushioned fit.

  • CMEVA: PUMA's compression-moulded EVA material for lightweight performance
  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
  • Heel-to-toe-drop: 0 mm
  • Synthetic upper
  • Soft moulded footbed
  • CMEVA midsole

Cover up your style game with your soon to be prized possesion PUMA Pants a testament for sleek & style
  • Fit Type - Slim Fit
  • Sustainable Material
  • PUMA insignia at the front
  • Draw cords & elastic waistband to provide a better fit
  • Flatlock stitching for anti-friction

Don't like too much of the spotlight? Well, when you're wearing the sleek and stylish PUMA graphic women's knit jacket, staying away from those eyes might be a struggle. Better get used to it.
  • Slim fit
  • Cotton
    • Side zip pockets
  • Ribbed waistband and cuff

Why need someone else when the PUMA men's hooded knitte jacket is perfect for the snuggles you need. The stylish jacket screams fearless and bold. So, why don't you make some space for it?

Nothing is impossible in this lightweight running tee constructed from breathable, moisture-wicking fabric with reflective design elements.

  • dryCELL: PUMA's designation for moisture-wicking properties that help keep you dry and comfortable

posts.post_content:
This striking graphic tee is part of the PUMA x PUMA collection, which draws on the timeless tennis silhouettes of stars like Boris Becker. Reinvented for 2020, the vintage-inspired design and bold graphic prints ensure you stand out, while 100% cotton fabric supports sustainable farming.

  • By buying cotton products from PUMA, you’re supporting more sustainable cotton farming. Learn more at PUMA.COM/FOREVERBETTER
  • Loose fit
  • Ribbed crew neck
  • Double woven label on hem
  • PUMA Archive No.1 Logo embroidery on front
  • 100% Cotton BCI

posts.post_content:
Get ready for summer with the PUMA x 1DER Popcat 20 Unisex Slides - the perfect combination of style and comfort. With a padded synthetic leather strap and injected EVA outsole, these slides are sure to provide you with the softness and cushioning you need for all your summer activities. And with a collaboration with the trendy 1DER brand, you'll be the envy of all your friends at the beach or pool.

  • Heel type: Flat
  • Shoe width: Regular fit
  • Heel-to-toe-drop: 0 mm
  • Shoe pronation: Neutral
  • Padded, synthetic leather strap
  • Injected EVA outsole for additional softness and cushioning

These versatile leggings are as functional as they are flattering. The tight fit creates a sleek silhouette, while smart graphics and iconic branding adds a modern look. The jacquard waistband and diamond gusset ensure total comfort. PUMA's dryCELL technology helps wick moisture away from your skin, keeping you dry and comfortable.

  • dryCELL: PUMA's designation for moisture-wicking properties that help keep you dry and comfortable

Kick back in sporty style and comfort in these PUMA Tape Regular Fit Knitted Men's Sweat Pants, featuring PUMA tape detailing along the sides for a modern look and an adjustable waistband for a customized fit. They're made from sustainable cotton too, so you'll not only look great, but feel good about wearing them too.

posts.post_content:
Introducing the next generation of PUMA Football: the individualFINAL collection. Designed for the highest level of performance, this jersey combines lightweight, breathable, recycled fabrics with form-fitting cuts and dryCELL moisture-wicking technology to yield a shirt specifically tailored to the demands of the game and the best athletes in the world.

PUMA's SOFTRIDE technology represents an advancement in footwear comfort. It incorporates our softest foam, designed to deliver extreme cushioning that promotes sustained comfort throughout the day. The SOFTRIDE midsole, softer and lighter than traditional EVA, extends through the full length of the shoe. This innovative construction enhances the wearer's experience, providing lightweight support during daily activities.

Slip into high-voltage style in these Mercedes-AMG Petronas Motorsport slides. These simple sandals contain all the luxe design you expect and the high performance you demand. Boasting a padded synthetic leather strap with a graphic Mercedes-AMG Petronas Motorsport print, a comfortable moulded footbed and grippy, durable outsole. These slides exude a fierce F1 look wrapped in the iconic PUMA silhouette you love.

posts.post_content:
The ultimate combo, this confidently branded shorts and tee set is so soft and comfortable, you’ll never want to take it off. The 100% cotton fabrication is super-cosy against the skin, while the elastic waistband with customisable drawcord is next-level comfy. Side pockets add handy storage for your essentials and the forwarded side seams create optimal freedom of movement and an athletic fit. Despite the sporty appearance, this set has an easy regular fit and relaxed vibe.

  • Regular fit tee and shorts
  • Ribbed crew neck on the tee
  • Side pockets on the shorts
  • Forwarded side seams on the shorts
  • Elastic waistband with internal drawcord

Designed for the active individual, this iconic collection celebrates the transformative power of sport. Embrace a faster, better, forever lifestyle and live your game!

Summer is coming, and these slides are the footwear you need to see you through the season. The fresh, modern design takes your casualwear look to the next level – but these slides are as much about substance as style. A padded leather strap and moulded footbed ensure supreme comfort, while the outsole provides grip and traction on wet surfaces, so you’ll be prepared for anything whether you're hanging out at home or lounging around the pool.

posts.post_content:
Feel fresh with the Popcat 20 Shower Sandals, designed for post-activity relaxation both in and out of the shower. These plush sliders feature a water repellent IMEVA strap and an anti-slippage textured bottom, as well as iconic PUMA Cat Logo branding. This is the post-training essential you didn't know you needed.

PUMA's SOFTRIDE technology represents an advancement in footwear comfort. It incorporates our softest foam, designed to deliver extreme cushioning that promotes sustained comfort throughout the day. The SOFTRIDE midsole, softer and lighter than traditional EVA, extends through the full length of the shoe. This innovative construction enhances the wearer's experience, providing lightweight support during daily activities.

Looking for a pair of slides that you don’t need to take off after a long day at the beach? The SOFTRIDE Massage Men's Slides will keep your feet happy and comfortable all day. Designed with an integrated massage arch, these sandals will give any foot some much-deserved TLC. It also offers a padded heel collar for additional comfort over prolonged usage, as well as PUMA branding on the strap – a must-have for casual summer days out.

This bag is logomania, inside and out. The front zip pocket features a large PUMA No. 1 Logo print, while the straps also call out the brand in bold fashion with contrasting wordmarks down each side. An all-in-one neutral running shoe for any distance, the Velocity NITRO 2 is a lightweight and sleek update to the Run PUMA roster. Featuring NITRO foam for exceptional responsiveness and ultimate cushioning, this upgrade to the original is a well-fitting and durable shoe for a smooth ride. Built for comfort at whatever speed, the versatile runner also provides enhanced visibility through reflective accents, so you can hit your stride on your time. PUMAGRIP offers multi-surface traction, from treadmill to track. 

  • NITRO FOAM: PUMA's advanced technology providing superior responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight package
  • PUMAGRIP: PUMA's durable rubber compound that provides all-surface traction
